trends: There has been one other sighting in Silverado
There were no other sightings in Silverado on or around October 7th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
divs: sighting detailshttp:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=q4s5c_sqavq eh, was up on saddleback mountain riding my motorcycle and had my little cheap dv aiptek camera with me as its easy to carry and not much loss if i crash. at one point i got one right next to me and also saw one that revealed itself through what seemed to be a light portal. see the video, if you want. all true and lately seemingly a daily experience that most can't see. i went to the top of the mountain to catch the sunset and had a "feeling." the objects seemed to skip like a stone and were completely noticeable and rather touch n go. there seemed to be a really large one in the clouds (mother) that these smaller ones interfaced with drones. one of them seemed as curious as me and looked through a dimensional light breach portal (see pics). my feeling was well you look neat but can you give me a ride... and the ride was more like a dimensional tangent and buzzing sound, which was annoying. i didn't lose sight of the object, seemed to follow me down the hill. despite the noise the light show was great. several people drove by, but i didn't bring it to their attention and they didn't seem to notice, i didn't want to scare off the buggers.
